tasks: Inspect a laptop with a tall lamp.
Turn on the lamp in the right corner of the room while holding a lap top.
Turn on the floor lamp using the console as a remote control.
Put a remote in a box and return the remote to its original place.
Place a remote in a box and move them to the chair.
Put a cardboard box with a remote in it on a chair.
Turn the floor lamp on while holding a watch.
Look at a watch by the light of a lamp.
Grab the watch from the TV cabinet, turn on the floor lamp
Put a book on the blue couch.
move the book from the white sofa to the grey sofa
Move the book from the chair to the couch.
Put a book on a couch.
move a book from the chair to the couch
Move a book from the chair to the couch.
examine the keys with the lamp
Examine the keys by the light of the tall lamp.
Turn on a lamp and take your keys.
Pick up the keys and turn on the lamp.
Examine a key chain by the light of a floor lamp.
Examine a set of keys using the light of a floor lamp.
Put a credit card on the chair.
Move a credit card from the coffee table to the striped armchair.
Move a card from the table to the chair.

task_list: examine the keys with the lamp

examine the keys with the lamp
Put a book on the blue couch.

finetuned.compose 1: Pick up the keys and turn on the lamp. After that, put a book on the blue couch.
finetuned.compose 2: Put a book on the blue couch. Simultaneously, pick up the keys and turn on the lamp.
finetuned.compose 3: Pick up the keys and turn on the lamp at any time. Once done, put a book on the blue couch.

task_list: Put a remote in a box and return the remote to its original place.
Pick up the keys and turn on the lamp.

finetuned.compose 1: Pick up the keys and turn on the lamp. After turning on the lamp, put a remote in a box and return the remote to its original place.
finetuned.compose 2: Put a remote in a box and return the remote to its original place. Simultaneously, pick up the keys and turn on the lamp.
finetuned.compose 3: Pick up the keys and turn on the lamp. Put a remote in a box and return the remote to its original place after turning on the lamp.

Put a credit card on the chair.

finetuned.compose 2: Turn the floor lamp on while holding a watch at any time. After turning the lamp on, put a credit card on the chair.
finetuned.compose 3: Turn the floor lamp on while holding a watch at any time. Simultaneously, put a credit card on the chair.

finetuned.compose 2: Put a book on the blue couch at any time. Simultaneously, pick up the keys and turn on the lamp. After putting the book, put a remote in a box and return the remote to its original place.
finetuned.compose 3: Pick up the keys and turn on the lamp. After turning on the lamp, put a remote in a box and return the remote to its original place. Put a book on the blue couch after completing the previous tasks.

finetuned.compose 2: Pick up the keys and turn on the lamp at any time. Simultaneously, put a credit card on the chair. After picking up the keys and turning on the lamp, put a remote in a box and return the remote to its original place.
finetuned.compose 3: Pick up the keys and turn on the lamp at any time. Simultaneously, put a credit card on the chair. After putting the credit card on the chair, put a remote in a box and return the remote to its original place.

Pick up the keys and turn on the lamp.

finetuned.compose 1: Pick up the keys and turn on the lamp. After turning on the lamp, inspect a laptop with a tall lamp. Finally, put a credit card on the chair.
finetuned.compose 2: Inspect a laptop with a tall lamp at any time. Simultaneously, put a credit card on the chair. After inspecting the laptop, pick up the keys and turn on the lamp.
finetuned.compose 3: Put a credit card on the chair first. Then pick up the keys and turn on the lamp. After turning on the lamp, inspect a laptop with a tall lamp.

examine the keys with the lamp
Put a book on the blue couch.

finetuned.compose 1: Inspect a laptop with a tall lamp. Subsequently, examine the keys with the lamp. After examining the keys, put a book on the blue couch. Finally, put a credit card on the chair.
finetuned.compose 2: Put a book on the blue couch. Concurrently, put a credit card on the chair. After placing the book and credit card, inspect a laptop with a tall lamp. Following that, examine the keys with the lamp.
finetuned.compose 3: Examine the keys with the lamp. Following the examination, put a book on the blue couch. Simultaneously, put a credit card on the chair. Conclusively, inspect a laptop with a tall lamp.

task_list: Put a credit card on the chair.
Put a book on the blue couch.
Pick up the keys and turn on the lamp.
Inspect a laptop with a tall lamp.

finetuned.compose 1: Put a credit card on the chair and pick up the keys to turn on the lamp. After completing those tasks, put a book on the blue couch and inspect a laptop with a tall lamp.
finetuned.compose 2: Pick up the keys and turn on the lamp first. Then, put a book on the blue couch and inspect a laptop with a tall lamp. Afterward, put a credit card on the chair.
finetuned.compose 3: Inspect a laptop with a tall lamp first. Then, put a credit card on the chair. After completing those tasks, pick up the keys to turn on the lamp and put a book on the blue couch.
